column9: Having, by now, tried quite a few pizzerias in Lund in the category of "kebab-pizza", i.e. not owned/managed by Italians and with Italian pizza-makers, I can say that Mårtens takes at least the prize of excelling over its direct competitors as concerns the quality of...More
Tasty pizza, good price, quick service, and friendly staff. We were pleasantly surprised after just arriving in Lund.

Love these folks ! And you will too ! Fresh swedish pizza and coolest staff in this town ! 
Look for Sulle and he will hook you up !
Ja som titeln säger var deras kebab i pita bröd det bästa man kan äta om man känner sig bakis....More

Åt en lunch med mina barn på detta etablissemang.
